artist: Engraver: Gaillard; Artist: After Charles Eisen
description: central portrait of right profile of man in oval frame with portrait of semi-reclining woman in Greek costume at left; portrait of Dutch man at left
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscriptions

on sheet below image in black:[C. Eisen inv   Galliard sculp./JACQUES/ BACKER]; in pencil: [1-62]; on upper right corner of mount in pencil: [85]
title: Portrait of Jacques Backer
